description: Source file implementing DataElement class with CRC32 calculation and LinkedDataElement class with buffer management, including methods for buffer access and copying.

classes.name: DataElement
classes.description: Class providing CRC32 checksum calculation over its buffer.

classes.name: LinkedDataElement
classes.description: Class managing linked buffers with methods for buffer access and data copying across linked segments.

methods.name: uint32_t CRC32(const uint64_t offset,const uint64_t size) const
methods.description: Calculates CRC32 checksum over a segment of the DataElement buffer.

methods.name: void GetBuffer(uint64_t offset,uint32_t size,uint8_t * buffer) const
methods.description: Retrieves data from the Buffer, handling boundary crossing across linked data segments.

methods.name: void SetBuffer(uint64_t offset,uint32_t size,const uint8_t * buffer)
methods.description: Writes data into the Buffer, handling boundary crossing across linked data segments.

methods.name: uint64_t Copy(const uint64_t offset,const LinkedDataElement & copy)
methods.description: Copies data from another LinkedDataElement into this one, spanning multiple linked segments if necessary.

ctags.name: CRC32
ctags.pattern: /^    uint32_t DataElement::CRC32(const uint64_t offset, const uint64_t size) const$/

ctags.name: Copy
ctags.pattern: /^    uint64_t LinkedDataElement::Copy(const uint64_t offset, const LinkedDataElement& copy)$/

ctags.name: GetBuffer
ctags.pattern: /^    void LinkedDataElement::GetBuffer(uint64_t offset, uint32_t size, uint8_t* buffer) const$/

ctags.name: SetBuffer
ctags.pattern: /^    void LinkedDataElement::SetBuffer(uint64_t offset, uint32_t size, const uint8_t* buffer)$/
